original_text: But the men would not hearken to him: so the man took his concubine, and brought her forth unto them; and they knew her, and abused her all the night until the morning: and when the day began to spring, they let her go.
korean_text: 무리가 듣지 아니하므로 그 사람이 자기 첩을 붙잡아 그들에게 밖으로 끌어내매 그들이 그 여자와 관계하였고 밤새도록 그 여자를 능욕하다가 새벽 미명에 놓은지라

sentences.original_text: But the men would not hearken to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 남자들은 그의 말을 듣지 아니하였으니

sentences.original_text: so the man took his concubine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 남자는 그의 첩을 데려오고

sentences.original_text: and brought her forth unto them
and abused her all the night
and when the day began to spring
